## AlchemyConfig interface

Options object used to configure the Alchemy SDK.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AlchemyConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiKey?](./exploring-pioneer.alchemyconfig.apikey.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The Alchemy API key that can be found in the Alchemy dashboard. |
|  [maxRetries?](./exploring-pioneer.alchemyconfig.maxretries.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> The maximum number of retries to attempt if a request fails. Defaults to 5. |
|  [network?](./exploring-pioneer.alchemyconfig.network.md) | [Network](./exploring-pioneer.network.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The name of the network. |
